description: The ui looks clean and simple but could be worked on and why is it only for premium users :( I wanna use it ;(
The login button didn't work. The prompt to clear the cache couldn't be closed. Poor experience.

The reason for it being premium only is because Spotify restricts some of their Web API's and makes them only for premium subscribers. 
From developer.spotify.com:
"If the user making the request is non-premium, a 403 FORBIDDEN response code will be returned." So there is no way to play songs with a third party client if you aren't a premium user. If you are a non-premium user, I recommend spicetify-cli if you want to customize your spotify client.
summary: There's a reason for it being Premium only
